chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: R -> R
x: R
b: R
a: R

Goal:
Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> Rbar_le (f x) (Sup_fct f a b)

Premises:
*** [ R : Set ]
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Rbar_le = fun x y : Rbar => match x with | Finite x0 => match y with | Finite y0 => x0 <= y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match y with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end : Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop
Sup_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => if Req_EM_T a b then Finite 0 else Lub_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
ex_Im_fct : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a <> b -> exists x x0 : R, x = f x0 /\ Rmin a b < x0 < Rmax a b
Riemann_integrable_bound : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> exists s : R, forall x : R, Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b -> f x <= s
Inf_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => if Req_EM_T a b then Finite 0 else Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Sup_fct_bound : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Sup_fct f a b = Sup_fct f b a
phi_sequence_prop : forall (un : nat -> posreal) (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b) (N : nat), {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi_sequence un pr N t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < un N}
phi_sequence : (nat -> posreal) -> forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> nat -> StepFun a b
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
open_interval = fun a b x : R => a < x < b : R -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope R_scope]
fe : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R -> R
adapted_couple = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l lf : Rlist) => ordered_Rlist l /\ pos_Rl l 0 = Rmin a b /\ pos_Rl l (Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l)) = Rmax a b /\ Rlength l = S (Rlength lf) /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> constant_D_eq f (open_interval (pos_Rl l i) (pos_Rl l (S i))) (pos_Rl lf i)) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Rlist -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _ _]
Rbar_lt_locally : forall (a b : Rbar) (x : R), Rbar_lt a x -> Rbar_lt x b -> exists delta : posreal, forall y : R, Rabs (y - x) < delta -> Rbar_lt a y /\ Rbar_lt y b
IsStepFun = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => {l : Rlist & is_subdivision f a b l} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
RiemannInt_SF : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R
Rminus_lt_0 : forall a b : R, a < b < -> 0 < b - a
filter_forall : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x) -> ?F P where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R x : R |- Type] ?F : [f : R -> R a : R b : R x : R |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [f : R -> R a : R b : R x : R |- Filter ?F]
mkStepFun : forall (a b : R) (fe : R -> R), IsStepFun fe a b -> StepFun a b
is_subdivision = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l : Rlist) => {l0 : Rlist & adapted_couple f a b l l0} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
StepFun_bound : forall f0 : StepFun ?a ?b, exists s : R, forall x0 : R, Rmin ?a ?b <= x0 <= Rmax ?a ?b -> f0 x0 <= s where ?a : [f : R -> R a : R b : R x : R |- R] ?b : [f : R -> R a : R b : R x : R |- R]
locally_interval : forall (P : R -> Prop) (x : R) (a b : Rbar), Rbar_lt a x -> Rbar_lt x b -> (forall y : R, Rbar_lt a y -> Rbar_lt y b -> P y) -> locally x P
maj_term2 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 alp_f2t2 : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs (eps * (f2 x)² / (8 * l1))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2t2 ->...-> Rabs (l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h))) < eps / 4
maj_term4 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 alp_f2c : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2c -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * f2 x * eps / (8 * f1 x * l2))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 ->...-> Rabs (l2 * f1 x / ((f2 x)² * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 (x + h) - f2 x)) < eps / 4
maj_term1 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f1d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f1d -> Rabs ((f1 (x + h0) - f1 x) / h0 - l1) < Rabs (eps * f2 x / 8)) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f1d ->...-> Rabs (/ f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1)) < eps / 4
maj_term3 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f2d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f2d -> Rabs ((f2 (x + h0) - f2 x) / h0 - l2) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * eps / (8 * f1 x))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) ->...-> Rabs (f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2)) < eps / 4
Rabs_left1 : forall a : R, a <= 0 -> Rabs a = - a
Record StepFun (a b : R) : Type := mkStepFun { fe : R -> R; pre : IsStepFun fe a b } For mkStepFun: Arguments a, b, fe are implicit For StepFun: Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope] For mkStepFun: Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope _]
constant_D_eq = fun (f : R -> R) (D : R -> Prop) (c : R) => forall x : R, D x -> f x = c : (R -> R) -> (R -> Prop) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope R_scope]
Rmax_neg : forall x y : R, x < 0 -> y < 0 -> Rmax x y < 0
Rmax_lub_lt : forall x y z : R, x < z -> y < z -> Rmax x y < z
Rbar_locally = fun (a : Rbar) (P : R -> Prop) => match a with | Finite a0 => locally a0 P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end : Rbar -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
Rbar_locally' = fun (a : Rbar) (P : R -> Prop) => match a with | Finite a0 => locally' a0 P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end : Rbar -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
